name: Jetpack Invader
description:
Join the invading humans by controlling a human designed with the intention of destroying other civilizations. Destroy their cities and their drones with the help of your bullet generating jet pack, in order to achieve points. Upgrade your astronaut suit in order to fend off the aliens defending their homes!

     Be the monster!!!

  • CONTROLS

     - Jump - Space

     - Left - A

     - Right - D

     -Escape - Pause

  • MUSIC NOT OWNED BY ME :
